item.description:
Another movie meetup! Join us as we watch Ayn Rand's epic novel continue to unfold on the big screen.
http://www.atlasshruggedmovie.com

We will be seeing the 4:15pm show. We willl meet around 3:45 pm in the lobby and then head up to the theater to find seats.

After the movie, we'll head over to the Red Hat (9 Bowdoin St, upstairs) for food & drink. If you can't make it to the movie, feel free to meet us there - probably around 7:00 PM.

It is strongly suggested that you buy tickets in advance:
https://www.fandango.com/purchase/movietickets/process03/ticketboxoffice.aspx?row_count=0&tid=AAPNV&from=Redirect.aspx&mid=156928&wssaffid=5017778&wssac=0&refreshdate=10%2F12%2F20...

***
Also posted to Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/events/141946595951038/
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the lobby and then head up to the theater to find seats. My cell is (617) 784-7764
item.name: Movie Meetup: Atlas Shrugged II
